data.title: June 8 In Hip-Hop History: Kanye West Is Born
meta_keywords: June 8 In Hip-Hop History: Kanye West Is Born
data.meta_description: The Chicago rapper-producer celebrates his birthday today.  | iHeart
data.text:
Ye has officially added another year to his lasting legacy on Planet Earth. Regardless of what you may think of him, the glorified rap star formerly known as Kanye West is still revered as one of the greatest artists of our generation.

On this day in 1977, Kanye Omari West was born to Ray and Donda West in Atlanta, Ga. He started writing poetry as a toddler and was selling musical compositions by 7th grade. He wrote his first rap song at age 13 called "Green Eggs and Ham." As a teenager, West met famed producer No I.D. He eventually became Ye's mentor who schooled him in the art of sampling.

"[A Tribe Called Quest's] Low End Theory was the first album I bought," he told MTV in 2004. "I was like, 'Oh s**t [they] have whole albums? They don't just have the singles?' I was like, 'I'mma start buying a bunch of s**t.' "

Ye eventually graduated high school, attended college and later dropped out in order to pursue his rap career. He first garnered his credibility in the music industry by producing beats for numerous hip-hop artists while yearning to be a rapper himself. After playing his music for numerous record labels and media publications, Ye finally got his foot in the door at Roc-A-Fella Records. It took some time for the label to take him seriously as a rapper, but once they did, Ye was able to drop his critically-acclaimed debut album The College Dropout in 2004.

He immediately left a lasting impact on the culture with his debut single "Through The Wire" as well as "All Falls Down," "Jesus Walks," "Get Em High" and "Slow Jamz." Ye continued to deliver more memorable albums throughout the span of his career like Late Registration (2005), Graduation (2007), 808s & Heartbreak (2008),My Beautiful Dark Twisted Fantasy (2010), Yeezus (2013), The Life of Pablo (2016), Ye (2018), Jesus Is King (2019), and Donda (2021). He also released a joint album with JAY-Z Watch The Throne in 2011 and with Kid Cudi KIDS SEE GHOSTS in 2018.

The multifaceted artist and fashion designer has achieved so much in his 46 years of life. During his marriage to Kim Kardashian, he became the father of four children: daughter North (9), son Saint (7), daughter Chicago (5) and son Psalm (4). Following his divorce from Kim, he reportedly marriage his current wife Bianca Censori.

Happy Birthday Ye!
